#summary Mathematics-related packages.

= Introduction =

_*Calculia*_ builds on the mathematical functionality in _[Brainstem]_, including tools for parsing and displaying [http://www.w3.org/Math/ MathML-Content].

Brainstem is included in bin/3lbmonkeybrain.swc, or can be used on its own with bin/3lbmonkeybrain-calculia.swc. 

= Details =

This package is still in development.
